events.message: Customer reported a car collision incident that occurred on 2024-04-28 at an intersection. Immediate claim filing was initiated to begin the process.
The claim was reviewed and appropriately categorised as an Auto Accident claim based on description and keywords within the customer report.
An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accident cases was assigned to ensure the customer receives prompt and effective assistance.
Customer has been contacted and the claim has been officially acknowledged with a clear outline of next steps in the investigation and resolution process.
Requested the customer to submit all relevant documents including police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Customer successfully provided all requested documents which included detailed pictures and official police report relevant to the accident claim.
Investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted documents and is in the process of contacting involved parties and witnesses.
The investigation was completed with confirmation that the collision details match the customerâ€™s report and no conflicting accounts were found.
A settlement offer based on damage evaluation and policy coverage was proposed and sent to the customer for review.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim so far.
The claim was formally approved after the customer accepted the settlement terms and no further clarifications were required.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement amount has been issued and confirmed by the finance department.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following settlement payment and customer confirmation of receipt.
All documents and communications related to this auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference.
